column4: U.S. Supreme Court revives pregnant worker’s case against UPS
column5: WASHINGTON The U.S. Supreme Court on Wednesday sided with a former driver for UPS Inc by giving her another chance to argue that the package delivery company discriminated against her when it refused to lighten her work duties while she was pregnant.
